scope.title: Predicting negligence claims with NHS Resolution
scope.summary: This project investigated whether it is possible to use machine learning AI to predict the number of claims a trust is likely to receive and learn what drives them in order to improve safety for patients.

meta.title: Predicting negligence claims with NHS Resolution
meta.summary: This project investigated whether it is possible to use machine learning AI to predict the number of claims a trust is likely to receive and learn what drives them in order to improve safety for patients.
